resources.string:
Welcome to Hunt!


This short tutorial will teach you the basics of playing the game.

Press anywhere to continue
To release a net, draw a circle with your finger. If you time it correctly, you will catch a Prey!
Many times, a Prey will hide under algae. To catch it cleanly, you can lure it out with food
Another way to catch a hiding Prey is to cut the algae using the Knife tool
Throwing a net around the prey.
Catch the prey.\nUse your finger to draw a circle around it.\nDon\'t worry, I\'m hold it still.
Lure the prey out of the algae and catch it with a net.
Hunt down the prey using the skills you learned.\nRemember to switch back to Net tool by holding your finger down anywhere and selecting the net icon.
Placing food and waiting for the prey to come out. Then snatch!
Switching the active tool to Knife.\nThen cutting the big algae in half
Be the best Hunter!\n*\tSee your score in Global Ranklist\n*\tCompete with friends
